intro: This document serves as a comprehensive product user manual for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) Urban Atlas, focusing on the land cover/land use (LU/LC) and Street Tree Layer (STL) products for the reference years 2012 and 2018. It provides detailed mapping guidance, nomenclature, and specifications for service providers involved in the production of standardised, high-resolution maps covering over 800 Functional Urban Areas (FUAs) across Europe and Turkey, ensuring congruent product attributes, comparable quality, and a common look and feel.
keywords: ETRS89 Lambert Azimuthal Equal Area projection
